scripts.k3d-setup: k3d cluster delete pepr-dev && k3d cluster create pepr-dev --k3s-arg '--debug@server:0'
scripts.dev:deploy: npx pepr deploy --confirm && kubectl rollout status deployment -n pepr-system
scripts.dev:deploy:fresh: npm run k3d-setup; npm run dev:deploy
scripts.dev:deploy:restart: kubectl rollout restart deployment -n pepr-system && kubectl rollout status deployment -n pepr-system
scripts.dev:reapply: npm run dev:unapply ; npm run dev:apply
scripts.dev:refresh: npm run dev:unapply ; npm run dev:deploy:restart ; npm run dev:apply
scripts.dev:logs: npm run --silent dev:uuid | xargs -I {} kubectl logs -n pepr-system -l "app=pepr-{}" --all-containers --tail=-1 2>/dev/null | grep -v '/healthz' | jq --slurp 'sort_by(.time)'
scripts.dev:logs:msg: npm run --silent dev:logs | jq -r '.[] | (.time | tostring) +" "+ (.hostname | split("-") | last) +" "+ .msg'
